entry.title: Dettol - Antiseptic Liquid - 550 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dettol
Type: Disposables
Price: 9.49

Dettol - Antiseptic Liquid - 550ml
For over 80 years, Dettol brand has been protecting families all over the world and helping them to fight germs and bacteria. You, too, can help protect against infection from cuts, scratches and insect bites by using Dettol Antiseptic Liquid on skin.
•Effective protection from germs that cause infections
•Antiseptic wound cleaning for cuts, blemishes and insect bites
•For cuts, blemishes and insect bites wash with a solution of 25 mL Dettol to 200 mL water
•Contains Chloroxylenol
•For external use only
•Always read the label before using and use as directed

entry.title: Zytec - Germ Buster Gel Hand Sanitizer Pro 70% Alcohol - 100 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Zytec
Type: Disposables
Price: 3.49

Product Description

This sanitizer by Zytec comes in a convenient 100 ml bottle. It’s 70% alcohol gel formula is strong enough to kill germs and bacteria. It’s aloe and Vitamin E enriched formula makes it safe and soft for use on hands.

Features

  • 100 ml  bottle
  • Contains 70% alcohol
  • Kills harmful germs and bacteria
  • Enriched with aloe, vitamin E and additional moisturizers
  • Safe to use on hands
  • Dries quickly
  • Does not require wiping or rinsing
  • Leaves no residue behind
  • Ideal for home, office, and gyms
  • Made in Canada

entry.title: Zytec - Germ Buster Extra Strength Sanitizer Spray 80% Alcohol - 500 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Zytec
Type: Disposables
Price: 7.99

Product Description

This extra strength sanitizer by Zytec comes in a convenient 500 ml aerosol spray bottle. Its extra strength formula is strong enough to kill germs and bacteria on surfaces, and safe to use on hands. With 80% alcohol content, and fast action drying, this formula will help protect you and your family.

Features

  • 500 ml bottle
  • Contains 80% alcohol
  • Kills harmful germs and bacteria
  • Safe to spray on hands
  • Dries quickly
  • Does not require wiping or rinsing
  • Leaves no residue behind
  • Ideal for home, office, and gyms
  • Made in Canada

entry.title: Zytec - All Purpose Disinfectant Spray Refill Lemon Scent - 3.78 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Zytec
Type: Disposables
Price: 26.99

Product Description

Product Details

Zytec Germ Buster All-Purpose Disinfectant Pump Spray Refill kills harmful bacteria and may be used at home or at offices, schools, health care facilities, hospitals and other commercial and institutional settings.

  • Disinfectant Pump Spray Refill which may be applied on hard, nonporous, environment and inanimate object surfaces
  • Main Ingredient: 4.5 % Citric Acid
  • Inactive Ingredients: Aqua, Laureth-7, Parfum, Sodium Citrate
  • 3.78 L / 1 Gallon
  • Refill Jug
  • Made in Canada

entry.summary:
Vendor: Zytec
Type: Disposables
Price: 46.99

Zytec - Germ Buster Disinfectant Wipes Lemon Scented - 800/Pack

DETAILS

  • Kills 99.9% of viruses and bacteria
  • For use at home or at offices, schools, health care facilities, hospitals and other commercial and institutional settings
  • Pop-up container for easy dispensing
  • Lemon scented
  • May be used to clean or decontaminate critical or semi-critical medical devices prior to sterilization or high-level disinfection

    • Each wipe is 17 cm x 20 cm

entry.title: McCall's - 1 Lb. White Paper Bag With Window & Tin Tie Closure - 25/Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: McCall's
Type: Disposables
Price: 19.99

A creative package for displaying cookies & treats!

Perfect for packing cookies, cake pops and other baked goods, this tin tie cookie bag is just what your bakery, coffee shop or grocery store needs! Each bag features a clear window so customers can have a sneak peak at the goodies galore stored inside! To ensure freshness, each bag has a tin tie that allows bags to be resealed, which is attached to the back of the bag unless other placement is requested. Send your food out fresh and in style!

  • Laminated poly liner keeps contents fresh.
  • FDA and USDA compliant.
  • Metal tabs allow easy opening and a secure closure.

entry.title: Health & Smart - 4" x 4.1 Yards Sterile Rolled Gauze - Each
entry.summary:
Vendor: Health & Smart
Type: Disposables
Price: 3.29

Health & Smart - 4" x 4.1 Yards Sterile Rolled Gauze - Each
  • STERILE GAUZE: Latex-free, these sterile bandages are trusted by medical professionals, ideal for securing dressings, I.V.s, or splints, and for added support and cushioning; essential medical supplies
  • LIGHTWEIGHT AND BREATHABLE: made of medical-grade, porous texture, medical gauze wrap is breathable and lightweight, allows for ventilation and promotes healing; the lint-free rolled gauze reduces the risk of contamination
  • HIGHLY ABSORBENT: our large rolled gauze has a high absorbency rate, designed to keep your wound clean, dry and protected from infections, perfect to control bleeding or edemas, ideal gauze bandage for first aid wound care or injury recovering at home
  • STRETCH GAUZE: medical gauze easily stretches to conform to the wound site and the gauze rolls provides optimal coverage of various wound types; the conforming stretch gauze bandage can cut-to-fit or use as an overlap dressing, works well on knee, arm, leg, wrist, elbow, ankle, hands and any body parts

entry.title: Health & Smart - 3" x 4.1 Yards Sterile Rolled Gauze - Each
entry.summary:
Vendor: Health & Smart
Type: Disposables
Price: 3.19

Health & Smart - 3" x 3.5 Yard Elastic Bandage - Each
  • Health Smart Elastic Bandages are Soft, Flexible, and comfortable.
  • One bandage in package with securing clips.
  • 3 inches x 3.5 yards.
  • Health Smart Elastic Bandages are designed to provide frim support and compression to weak joints and helps to prevent and treat stress injuries.
  • Comfortable to wear for extended periods of time. Easy to use. Adjustable for a custom fit. Ideal for a wide ranged of areas and injuries.
